EmailTemplate.name: Vendor Review Date Upcoming
EmailTemplate.subject: Please book review with {!Vendor_Service_Review__c.Vendor__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To whom it may concern,
Please note that the vendor review for {!Vendor_Service_Review__c.Vendor__c} is due on {!Vendor_Service_Review__c.Scheduled_Date_for_Next_Review__c}
Please book this meeting.
Thanks
Operations
